Approval Process

Follow the steps below to see how your product moves through the approval process.

Step 1: Submit Product

Add your product details and upload images for admin review.

Step 2: Review by Admin

The admin carefully checks all submitted details, images, and pricing for accuracy and quality.

Step 3: Approval

Congratulations! Your product has been approved and is now live on the marketplace.

Step 4: Notification

You will receive a notification once your product is approved, so you stay updated.
